sentences.en: " Leap across the brook, naughty child, and run hither!
sentences.cn: “ 跳过小溪来, 顽皮的孩子, 跑过来!

sentences.en: A brook meanders through the meadow.
sentences.cn: 一条小溪从草地中蜿蜒流过.

sentences.en: He has often cast this brook.
He would brook no criticism, even from his beloved daughter.
sentences.cn: 他不能容忍任何批评，哪怕是自己深爱的女儿也不行。

sentences.en: He would brook no interruptions from his listeners.
I could hear the sound of a babbling brook.
sentences.cn: 我听得见小溪潺潺的流水声.

sentences.en: In our room we could hear the murmur of a distant brook.
sentences.cn: 在我们房间能听到远处小溪汩汩的流水声.

sentences.en: Keep where thou canst hear the babble of the brook. "
sentences.cn: 就在能听到流水声的地方好了. ”

sentences.en: The army will brook no weakening of its power.
sentences.cn: 这支部队不会容忍对其实力的削弱。

sentences.en: The brook loops around the farm.
The brook trickled through the valley.
The brook warbled over its rocky bed.
sentences.cn: 小溪潺潺流过多石的河床.

sentences.en: We will brook no outside interference.
sentences.cn: 我们不容许任何外来干涉.

trans.tran_en: to not allow or accept something
